member.name: T:Combat_Simulator.Player
member.summary: The player Class. To create a player, put the player number in and the role

member.name: T:Combat_Simulator.Skill
member.summary: The skill object. Contains information about the skill. Has a use() to use the skill. For cooldown based effects that target the skill, use addCooldown(value as integer).

member.name: M:Combat_Simulator.Skill.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Create a new skill using this function. Add the Name, the RoleType and the skill's description in. Additional information can be added.

member.name: T:Combat_Simulator.SkillLibrary
member.summary: The library where all the skills are stored, ready for use. To use this object, just create a new SkillLibrary().
